blocks.subject: Hertzberg
text: Does this cost center get allocated or direct charged?  Please get back to Morris for me.

blocks.subject: FW: Cost Center
text: Rod - What is our policy of accepting direct charges for corporate assistance?   Should this remain in corporate and be a part of the allocation?
Mike - Was any agreement made up front with Brindle to cover Kyle's expenses?   Was the request to travel made by Dave Odneal or yourself?

blocks.subject: FW: Cost Center  Morris, can you look at this for us.  I kinda think that the Corp Allocation is the right place for this expense.
raw_header: Morris, can you look at this for us.  I kinda think that the Corp Allocation is the right place for this expense.

blocks.subject: FW: Cost Center  I appreciate Kyle's expertise and work, but do we always pay the direct expenses for Corp assistance?
raw_header: I appreciate Kyle's expertise and work, but do we always pay the direct expenses for Corp assistance?

blocks.subject: FW: Cost Center  Mike:  In regard to Sharon's note below, please confirm the entities responsible for the cost of Kyle's trip.  Thank you,  Kim
raw_header: Mike:  In regard to Sharon's note below, please confirm the entities responsible for the cost of Kyle's trip.

blocks.subject: Cost Center
text: Kyle Norosky who works in Enron Corp Business Controls, recently flew to Minneapolis with regard to security issues.  He has told me that his trip is to be charged to ETS/Northern Pipeline cost center or project code.
Please can you let me know what company number and code to charge this to.  The total cost of his trip was $1603.28
